data.name: 0001 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, I don't really care about Kyon.

data.name: 0002 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That begs the question of why you didn't just leave me alone from the start then.

data.name: 0003 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it. I wasn't even able to justify this shameful sight to Asahina.

data.name: 0004 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More importantly! Attention, everyone!

data.name: 0005 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've figured out the truth behind this case!

data.name: 0006 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The… truth? What's this all of a sudden?

data.name: 0007 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm talking about the man-eating classroom of course!

data.name: 0008 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've finally arrived at the astounding truth! I—the great detective—have!

data.name: 0009 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Go on, tell us what it is I guess.

data.name: 0010 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When you hear it, you'll be shocked for sure.

data.name: 0011 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's a perfect and unobjectionable conclusion.

data.name: 0012 (385.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's rather intriguing. What in the world could said truth be?

data.name: 0013 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I had two clues, from which I was able to draw a single conclusion.

data.name: 0014 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Those clues are… these!

data.name: 0015 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Bursting with confidence, Haruhi pointed at the poster the Computer Society created…

data.name: 0016 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …as well as the plate with "1-6" written on it.

data.name: 0017 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like our efforts have paid off… for now.

data.name: 0018 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How are those two connected?

data.name: 0019 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll just pretend I don't have a clue and see what Haruhi's reasoning is.

data.name: 0020 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As usual, you don't even try to think about it.

data.name: 0021 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: None of your business.

data.name: 0022 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't worry Kyon, I'll make sure I explain it in a way that even you'll understand.

data.name: 0023 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm truly grateful. Could you use that kindness to call off this training camp?

data.name: 0024 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Firstly, take a look at this plate.

data.name: 0025 (385.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The plate for class 1-6, right?

data.name: 0026 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right. This is the plate that hangs over class 1-6.

data.name: 0027 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The question is—why has this plate been taken down?

data.name: 0028 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You get it, Mikuru?

data.name: 0030 (385.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0031 (385.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, no… Um… I don't understand.

data.name: 0032 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, that's what I expected.

data.name: 0033 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: To put it simply, the culprit offset each plate one across.

data.name: 0034 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look.

data.name: 0035 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, they took of class 6's plate and brought over the neighboring class 7 plate.

data.name: 0036 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you continue to offset things with class 8 and class 9 and so on…

data.name: 0037 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Before you know it, you've got a class 1-10.

data.name: 0038 (385.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, this would mean only class 1-10 wouldn't have a plate, but…

data.name: 0039 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh right, so only that classroom is left without a plate.

data.name: 0040 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I knew that was coming.

data.name: 0041 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's enjoying herself an awful lot, Haruhi is.

data.name: 0042 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's where these posters come in.

data.name: 0043 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi took out one of the Computer Society's water conservation posters.

data.name: 0044 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look at this bit of the poster.

data.name: 0045 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The "H20" letters.

data.name: 0046 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It look just like it says "1-10," right?

data.name: 0047 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Certainly I wouldn't say you're wrong, but…

data.name: 0048 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The culprit tampered with the poster to make it easy to mistake.

data.name: 0049 (385.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. What wonderful deuction, Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0050 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi you sly dog. He really appears genuinely impressed with her.

data.name: 0051 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you think? Perfect deduction, right?

data.name: 0052 (385.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. What else should I expect of Miss Suzumiya. I'm very impressed.

data.name: 0053 (385.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: A-amazing, Suzumiya.

data.name: 0054 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't believe it. Haruhi really doesn't seem to suspect that any of this was set up.

data.name: 0055 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This was definitely set up as a prank.

data.name: 0056 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder if maybe another member of the Computer Society was messing with them?

data.name: 0057 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why?

data.name: 0058 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe I'm pushing it, but I'll ask so Haruhi can reinforce her conclusion.

data.name: 0059 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right… It looks like they've been doing all nighters, so couldn't they have been venting?

data.name: 0060 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thought it unfortunately means our visits were in vain.

data.name: 0061 (385.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A water saving poster on the class plate? I had absolutely no idea.

data.name: 0062 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I continued to feign my ignorance by saying such things.

data.name: 0063 (385.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's why you're only a low-ranking brigade member. You need to think more flexibly.

data.name: 0064 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Say whatever you want.

data.name: 0065 (385.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As long as Haruhi is satisfied with the explanation, I have nothing to complain about.

data.name: 0066 (385.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
